\index{build() (lgimapy.index.IndexBuilder method)@\spxentry{build()}\spxextra{lgimapy.index.IndexBuilder method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:lgimapy.index.IndexBuilder.build}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{build}}}{\emph{name=''}, \emph{start=None}, \emph{end=None}, \emph{rating='IG'}, \emph{currency=None}, \emph{cusip=None}, \emph{issuer=None}, \emph{ticker=None}, \emph{sector=None}, \emph{subsector=None}, \emph{municipals=True}, \emph{treasuries=False}, \emph{maturity=(None}, \emph{None)}, \emph{price=(None}, \emph{None)}, \emph{country\_of\_domicile=None}, \emph{country\_of\_risk=None}, \emph{amount\_outstanding=(300}, \emph{None)}, \emph{issue\_years=(None}, \emph{None)}, \emph{collateral\_type=None}, \emph{OAD=(None}, \emph{None)}, \emph{OAS=(None}, \emph{None)}, \emph{OASD=(None}, \emph{None)}, \emph{liquidity\_score=(None}, \emph{None)}, \emph{credit\_stats\_only=False}, \emph{credit\_returns\_only=False}, \emph{financial\_flag=None}, \emph{special\_rules=None}}{}
Build index with customized rules from {\hyperref[\detokenize{index:lgimapy.index.IndexBuilder.df}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{IndexBuilder.df}}}}}.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{name}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default='{'}}}) \textendash{} Optional name for returned index.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{start}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{datetime}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=None}}) \textendash{} Start date for index, if None the start date from load is used.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{end}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{datetime}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=None}}) \textendash{} End date for index, if None the end date from load is used.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{rating}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ , }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Tuple}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{]}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default='IG'}}) \textendash{} 
Bond rating/rating range for index.

Examples:
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
str: ‘HY’, ‘IG’, ‘AAA’, ‘Aa1’, etc.

\item {} 
Tuple{[}str, str{]}: (AAA, BB) uses all bonds in
specified inclusive range.

\end{itemize}


\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{currency}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{List}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{]}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=None}}) \textendash{} Currency or list of currencies to include.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{cusip}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{List}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{]}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{: default=None}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{,}}) \textendash{} Cusip or list of cusips to include.

\item {}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{ticker}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{List}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{]}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=None}}) \textendash{} Ticker or list of tickers to include in index, default is all.

\item {}

\item {}

\item {}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{maturity}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{Tuple}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{]}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{\{5}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{10}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{20}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{30\}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=None}}) \textendash{} 
Maturities to include, if int is specified the following ranges
are used:
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
5: 4-6

\item {} 
10: 6-11

\item {} 
20: 11-25

\item {} 
30: 25 - 31

\end{itemize}


\item {}

\item {}

\item {}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{credit\_stats\_only}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=False}}) \textendash{} If True, only include bonds with credit stats in index.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{credit\_returns\_only}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=False}}) \textendash{} If True, only include bonds with credit returns in index.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{financial\_flag}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{\{'financial'}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{'non-financial'}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{'other'\}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=None}}) \textendash{} Financial flag setting to identify fin and non-fin credits.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{special\_rules}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{List}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{]} }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=None}}) \textendash{} 
Special rule(s) for subsetting index using bitwise operators.
If None, all specified inputs are applied independtently of
eachother as bitwise \&. All rules can be stacked using paranthesis
to create more complex rules.

Examples:
\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
Include specified sectors or subsectors:
‘Sector \textbar{} Subsector’

\item {} 
Include all but specified sectors:
‘\textasciitilde{}Sector’

\item {} 
Include either (all but specified currency or specified
sectors) xor specified maturities:
‘(\textasciitilde{}Currnecy \textbar{} Sector) \textasciicircum{} MaturityYears’

\end{itemize}


\end{itemize}

\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
{\hyperref[\detokenize{index:lgimapy.index.Index}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{Index}}}}} with specified rules.

\item[{Return type}] \leavevmode
{\hyperref[\detokenize{index:lgimapy.index.Index}]{\sphinxcrossref{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{Index}}}}}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{load() (lgimapy.index.IndexBuilder method)@\spxentry{load()}\spxextra{lgimapy.index.IndexBuilder method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:lgimapy.index.IndexBuilder.load}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{load}}}{\emph{start=None}, \emph{end=None}, \emph{cusips=None}, \emph{clean=True}, \emph{dev=False}, \emph{ret\_df=False}, \emph{local=False}, \emph{data=None}}{}
Load data from SQL server. If end is not specified data is scraped
through previous day. If neither start nor end are given only the
data from previous day is scraped. Optionally load from local
compressed format for increased performance or feed a DataFrame
directly.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{start}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{datetime}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=None}}) \textendash{} Starting date for scrape.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{end}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{datetime}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=None}}) \textendash{} Ending date for scrape.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{cusips}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{List}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{[}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{{]}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=None}}) \textendash{} List of cusips to specify for the load, by default load all.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{clean}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=True}}) \textendash{} If true, apply standard cleaning rules to loaded DataFrame.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{dev}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=False}}) \textendash{} If True, use development SQL query to load all fields.
\sphinxstylestrong{DO NOT USE IN PRODUCTION CODE}

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{ret\_df}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=False}}) \textendash{} If True, return loaded DataFrame.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{local}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=False}}) \textendash{} Load index from local binary file.

\end{itemize}

\item[{Returns}] \leavevmode
\sphinxstylestrong{df} \textendash{} DataFrame for specified date’s index data if \sphinxtitleref{ret\_df} is true.

\item[{Return type}] \leavevmode
pd.DataFrame

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{fit() (lgimapy.models.TreasuryCurveBuilder method)@\spxentry{fit()}\spxextra{lgimapy.models.TreasuryCurveBuilder method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:lgimapy.models.TreasuryCurveBuilder.fit}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{fit}}}{\emph{method='price'}, \emph{n=25}, \emph{n\_drop=10}, \emph{threshold=12}, \emph{solver='SLSQP'}, \emph{verbose=0}}{}
Solve zero coupon bond curve given all bonds by minimizing
the total squared error between the theoretical yield curve
and market observed yield to maturities.

Methodolgy and notation taken from
- \sphinxurl{https://www.jstatsoft.org/article/view/v036i01/v36i01.pdf}
\begin{quote}\begin{description}
\item[{Parameters}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{init\_params}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{\{'price'}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{'yield'\}}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default='price'}}) \textendash{} Minimize error in inversion duration weighted price or yield.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{n}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=20}}) \textendash{} Number of minimizations to run for final yield curve.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{n\_drop}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=10}}) \textendash{} Number of minimizations to run before dropping bonds
with large errors.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{theshold}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{float}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=12}}) \textendash{} Threshold (bp) that ytm errors must be within to not drop bonds
from fitting routine.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{solver}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{str}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default='SLSQP'}}) \textendash{} Scipy solver to use when minimizing errors.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{verbose}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{int}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=0}}) \textendash{} \begin{description}
\item[{Verbosity level for optimization.}] \leavevmode\begin{itemize}
\item {} 
0: No results.

\item {} 
1: Updated each time bonds are dropped.

\item {} 
2: Update each completed optimization simulation.

\item {} 
3: Update each optimization iteration.

\end{itemize}

\end{description}


\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{plot() (lgimapy.models.TreasuryCurveBuilder method)@\spxentry{plot()}\spxextra{lgimapy.models.TreasuryCurveBuilder method}}

\begin{fulllineitems}

Plot yield curve.
\begin{quote}\begin{description}

\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{indv\_bonds}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{bool}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=False}}) \textendash{} If true, show individual bond yields as data points.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{ax}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{matplotlib axis}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=None}}) \textendash{} Matplotlib axis to plot figure, if None one is created.

\item {} 
\sphinxstyleliteralstrong{\sphinxupquote{figsize}} (\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{list}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{ or }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{tuple}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{default=}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{(}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{6}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{, }}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{6}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{)}}\sphinxstyleliteralemphasis{\sphinxupquote{}}) \textendash{} Figure size.

\end{itemize}

\end{description}\end{quote}

\end{fulllineitems}

\index{coupon\_dates (lgimapy.models.TBond attribute)@\spxentry{coupon\_dates}\spxextra{lgimapy.models.TBond attribute}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\pysigline{\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{coupon\_dates}}}
Return list{[}datetime object{]} of timestamps for all coupons.
Note that all coupons are assumed to be on either the 15th or
last day of the month, business days and holidays are ignored.

\end{fulllineitems}
